verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sannuthinchedanu ellappudu nityamu Aayana keerti naa nota nundu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaaku praardhincha gaa naa bhayamantha Tholaginchenu shrama lannitilo naatho nundi (2) Chera deesi nannu aadarinche aaraadincheda Nellappudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jeevitha manthaa paadu chundunu nee Melulaku oh prabhuvaa naa aayushkaala Manthayunu (2) nee vishwaasyatha Kora keppudu nirathamu ninnu stotrinthu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahonnatha mainadi needu mahima ghanatha Prabhaavamu gala prabhuvaa thanivi Theeraga ninu poojinthu (2) tharagani nee Kaaryamulakai thappaka ninnu stutiyinthu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee sankalpamunu neraverchi nadipinchitivi Ghanamu ganu naaku prabhudavai naa Kaaparivai (2) naa jeevithamulo unnaavu Nijamuga ninnu pogadedanu{/lang-eng}
